mapper.select: select * from information where information_type = #{type} AND (status IS NULL OR status >= 0) order by information_id desc;
select * from information where information_id = #{id} AND information_type = #{type} AND (status IS NULL OR status >= 0) order by information_id desc;
select * from information where content LIKE '%${keyword}%' AND (status IS NULL OR status >= 0) order by information_id desc;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO information (`from`, `to`, status, content, title, submit_time, information_type, attachment) VALUES (#{from}, #{to}, #{status}, #{content}, #{title}, #{submitTime}, #{informationType}, #{attachment});
mapper.select: UPDATE information SET status = -1 WHERE information_id = #{id};

SELECT info.information_id, info.from, info.to, info.status, info.submit_time, info.content, info.title, info.information_type, info.attachment FROM information info, information_type infoType WHERE info.from = #{fromId} AND info.information_type = infoType.information_type_id AND infoType.type = #{type};

SELECT info.information_id, info.from, info.to, info.status, info.submit_time, info.content, info.title, info.information_type, info.attachment FROM information info, information_type infoType WHERE info.to = #{toId} AND info.information_type = infoType.information_type_id AND infoType.type = #{type};

SELECT info.information_id, info.from, info.to, info.status, info.submit_time, info.content, info.title, info.information_type, info.attachment FROM information info, information_type infoType WHERE info.information_id = #{informationId} AND info.information_type = infoType.information_type_id AND infoType.type = #{type};
